name: Level of empathy
interpretation: <17 - very low level of empathy, 17-28 low level of empathy, 29-51 - average level of empathy, 52-63 - high level of empathy, >63 - very high level of empathy

questions.question: I can easily tell if a person wants to join the conversation
I like animals more than people
I try to follow new trends
It's hard for me to explain something I'm good at to others if they didn't understand it the first time
I usually dream at night
I really like taking care of other people
I prefer to solve my own problems rather than discuss them with others
I don't really understand what to do in this or that case in communication
I feel best in the morning
People often tell me that I go too far in defending my point of view in a conversation
I don't worry too much if I'm late for a meeting with a friend
Friendships and relationships are too complex, and I prefer not to pay much attention to them in my life
I would never break a law, even the most insignificant one
It is often difficult for me to judge whether something is rude or polite
In conversation, I tend to focus on my own thoughts, rather than what my listener might be thinking
I like practical jokes better than oral jokes
I live for today rather than tomorrow
When I was a kid, I used to cut up worms to see what would happen
I quickly understand when someone says one thing and implies another
In general, I have strong beliefs about morality
Sometimes I find it difficult to understand what upsets others
I can easily put myself in someone else's shoes
I think that politeness is the main thing that a parent can teach a child
I like to do things in a rush of feelings
I'm good at predicting other people's feelings
I quickly notice when someone feels awkward and uncomfortable in the company of other people
If I say something that offends the other person, it's his business, not mine
If someone asks me if I like their hairstyle, I will answer honestly, even if I don't like it
I don't always understand why someone is offended by a comment
People often tell me that I'm unpredictable
I like being the center of attention in any society
I don't get too upset when someone else cries
I like to talk about politics
I am quite direct in conversation, which others sometimes take for rudeness, although I behave so unintentionally
I don't usually feel embarrassed when communicating
Other people tell me that I understand very well what they are feeling and thinking
When I talk to people, the conversation is more often based on their experiences, not mine
I get upset if I see an animal in pain
I can make decisions regardless of the feelings of others
I can't relax until I've completed all the tasks that I was going to do during the day
I can easily tell whether people are listening to me with curiosity or boredom when I speak
I get upset when I see people suffering in news broadcasts
Friends often tell me about their experiences, as they believe that I am an understanding person
I feel that I'm starting to impose myself, even if my interlocutor doesn't say it
I often start a new hobby, then I get bored with it, and I move on to something else
I am often told that I often go too far when I tease someone
I'm too nervous to ride a roller coaster
Others often tell me that I'm insensitive, even though I don't understand why
When I see a newcomer in any environment, it seems to me that he himself should make an effort to fit into this environment
I'm usually unemotional when I watch movies
I like order in my daily activities and often make a list of responsibilities for the day
I can easily and without hesitation tune in to the feeling that another person is experiencing
I don't like to take risks
I can easily understand what the other person wants to talk about
I can see when someone hides their true feelings
Before making decisions, I always weigh the pros and cons
I don't think carefully about how to behave in society
I can easily predict how another person will behave
I get emotionally involved in the troubles of my friends
I can always appreciate the other person's opinion, even if I don't agree with them
